body: Elves know the deep secrets of the wild like no others, especially secrets of the forests. Elves with this racial trait gain a +1 racial bonus on Knowledge (nature) and Survival checks. In forest terrain, these bonuses improve to +2. This racial trait replaces elven magic.
name: Woodcraft
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Elves/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Woodcraft
